metadata.title: Voyage Japan with AsukaIII | Premium Japanese Cruise Experience
metadata.description: Discover Japan's coastlines aboard AsukaIII, Japan's most prestigious cruise ship. Experience world-class hospitality, exquisite cuisine, and unforgettable destinations.

hero.headline: Discover Japan by Sea
hero.subheadline: Experience the extraordinary aboard AsukaIII, Japan's most prestigious cruise ship

brandStory.title: Why AsukaIII
brandStory.subtitle: A Legacy of Excellence
brandStory.paragraph1: For over three decades, the Asuka name has symbolized the pinnacle of Japanese hospitality at sea. AsukaIII continues this proud tradition, offering an unparalleled voyage experience that seamlessly blends Western luxury with Japanese refinement.
brandStory.paragraph2: Every journey aboard AsukaIII is crafted to reveal Japan's hidden treasures—from remote islands to historic ports—while enveloping you in world-class comfort and service.

experienceLinks.title: Explore AsukaIII
experienceLinks.subtitle: Four pillars of an unforgettable voyage

cruises.pageSubtitle: Explore Japan's diverse coastlines, from the subtropical islands of Okinawa to the rugged beauty of Hokkaido

cruiseDetail.priceNote: Prices shown are per person for two guests sharing one room. Single occupancy will incur an additional surcharge. Port charges and taxes included.
cruiseDetail.exchangeRateNote: Prices are approximate USD equivalents at ¥130 = $1. Actual prices are in Japanese Yen and subject to exchange rate fluctuations.

ship.pageSubtitle: AsukaIII represents the finest in Japanese maritime hospitality

overview.title: A Masterpiece of Maritime Design
overview.description: AsukaIII embodies the perfect harmony of Japanese aesthetics and modern luxury. Every detail, from the elegant public spaces to the meticulously appointed staterooms, reflects our commitment to providing an unparalleled cruise experience.

deckPlan.title: Deck Plan
deckPlan.subtitle: Explore the layout of AsukaIII across her eleven passenger decks

cabins.title: Accommodations
cabins.subtitle: Nine distinctive cabin types, each offering exceptional comfort

dining.title: Culinary Excellence
dining.subtitle: Six distinctive restaurants showcasing world-class cuisine
dining.barsSubtitle: Refined spaces for relaxation, conversation, and evening entertainment

art.title: A Floating Art Museum
art.subtitle: AsukaIII features an extraordinary collection of original works by Japan's most celebrated artists — including two Living National Treasures
art.description: More than a cruise ship, AsukaIII is a curated gallery at sea. The collection spans Japanese painting, lacquerwork, calligraphy, photography, and more — over 130 original works woven into every space of the vessel. As the artworks interact with the ship's wake and changing skies, they transform continuously, offering a living art experience found nowhere else on earth.
art.competitionNote: AsukaIII also features 126 selected works from an open art competition themed "Traveling Japan's Four Seasons," chosen from over 2,300 entries and judged by the ship's featured artists.
